Class Staff

java.lang.Object
hospital.usermanagment.User
hospital.usermanagment.Staff
Direct Known Subclasses:
Doctor, Pharmacist
public abstract class Staff extends User
Abstract class representing a staff member in the system. Inherits from the `User` class and includes a staff-specific ID.

  • Constructor Details

    • Staff

      public Staff(int userID, String password, String role, String name, String email, String contactNumber, String staffID)
      Constructor for initializing a staff member.
      Parameters:
      userID - The unique user ID.
      password - The password for the staff member.
      role - The role of the staff member (e.g., Doctor, Receptionist).
      name - The name of the staff member.
      email - The email address of the staff member.
      contactNumber - The contact number of the staff member.
      staffID - The unique staff ID.
